021import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
022import net.tnemc.core.account.Account;
023import net.tnemc.core.account.AccountStatus;
024import net.tnemc.core.account.GeyserAccount;
025import net.tnemc.core.account.NonPlayerAccount;
026import net.tnemc.core.account.PlayerAccount;
027import net.tnemc.core.account.SharedAccount;
028import net.tnemc.core.account.status.AccountLockedStatus;
029import net.tnemc.core.account.status.AccountNormalStatus;
030import net.tnemc.core.account.status.AccountRestrictedStatus;
031import net.tnemc.core.actions.EconomyResponse;
032import net.tnemc.core.actions.response.AccountResponse;
033import net.tnemc.core.api.callback.account.AccountCreateCallback;
034import net.tnemc.core.api.callback.account.AccountDeleteCallback;
035import net.tnemc.core.api.callback.account.AccountTypesCallback;
036import net.tnemc.core.api.response.AccountAPIResponse;
037import net.tnemc.core.config.MainConfig;
038import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
039import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.log.DebugLevel;
040import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.id.UUIDPair;
041import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.id.UUIDProvider;
042import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.id.impl.provider.BaseUUIDProvider;
043import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.maps.EnhancedHashMap;
044import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
045
046import java.util.ArrayList;
047import java.util.HashMap;
048import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
049import java.util.List;
050import java.util.Map;
051import java.util.Optional;
052import java.util.UUID;
053import java.util.function.Function;
054import java.util.regex.Pattern;
055
056/**
057 * Manages everything related to accounts.
058 *
059 * @author creatorfromhell
060 * @see Account
061 * @since 0.1.2.0
062 */
063public class AccountManager {
064
065  protected final Map<String, UUID> accountSwaps = new HashMap<>();
066  protected final UUIDProvider uuidProvider = new BaseUUIDProvider();
067  //exclusion lists for account argument parameters.
068  protected final List<Pattern> regexExclusions = new ArrayList<>();
069  protected final List<String> exclusions = new ArrayList<>();
070  /*
071   * list for if player accounts are loading in this will mean that players in this list
072   * will have balances loaded from the database for item-based currencies.
073   */
074  protected final List<UUID> loading = new ArrayList<>();
075  /*
076   * List for players that are loading in, but need to have their item currency imported from the inventory
077   * not the DB since they are new, or the currency doesn't exist.
078   */
079  protected final List<UUID> importing = new ArrayList<>();
080  private final EnhancedHashMap<String, Account> accounts = new EnhancedHashMap<>();
081  private final EnhancedHashMap<String, AccountStatus> statuses = new EnhancedHashMap<>();
082  private final LinkedHashMap<Class<? extends SharedAccount>, Function<String, Boolean>> types = new LinkedHashMap<>();
083
084  /**
085   * Used to create a new non-player account based on the provided name.
086   *
087   * @param name The name to use for this account.
088   *
089   * @return A correlating {@link AccountAPIResponse response} containing the results.
090   */
091  public AccountAPIResponse createAccount(final String name) {
092
093    return createAccount(name, name, true);
094  }
095
096  /**
097   * Used to create a new account based on the provided identifier and name.
098   *
099   * @param identifier The identifier to use for the creation, if this is a player then this should
100   *                   be the String value of the UUID for that player.
101   * @param name       The name to use for this account.
102   *
103   * @return A correlating {@link AccountAPIResponse response} containing the results.
104   */
105  public AccountAPIResponse createAccount(final String identifier, final String name) {
106
107    return createAccount(identifier, name, false);
108  }
109
110  /**
111   * Used to create a new account based on the provided identifier and name.
112   *
113   * @param identifier The identifier to use for the creation, if this is a player then this should
114   *                   be the String value of the UUID for that player.
115   * @param name       The name to use for this account.
116   * @param nonPlayer  True if the new account should be a non-player account.
117   *
118   * @return A correlating {@link AccountAPIResponse response} containing the results.
119   */
120  public AccountAPIResponse createAccount(final String identifier, final String name, final boolean nonPlayer) {
121
122    PluginCore.log().debug("Create Account Called! ID: " + identifier + " Name: " + name);
123    if(name.contains("§")) {
124      PluginCore.log().debug("==== AccountAPIResponse with color code! ====", DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
125
126      final StackTraceElement[] elements = Thread.currentThread().getStackTrace();
127      for(int i = 0; i < elements.length; i++) {
128        final StackTraceElement s = elements[i];
129        PluginCore.log().debug("\tat " + s.getClassName() + "." + s.getMethodName() + "(" + s.getFileName() + ":" + s.getLineNumber() + ")", DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
130      }
131      PluginCore.log().debug("==== End Stack Print ====", DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
132    }
133
134    if(identifier != null && accounts.containsKey(identifier)) {
135      PluginCore.log().debug("Account Exists Already. ID: " + identifier);
136
137      return new AccountAPIResponse(accounts.get(identifier), AccountResponse.ALREADY_EXISTS);
138    }
139
140    final Optional<UUIDPair> pair = uuidProvider.retrieve(name);
141    if(MainConfig.yaml().getBoolean("Core.Offline", false) && pair.isPresent() && accounts.containsKey(pair.get().getIdentifier().toString())) {
142      PluginCore.log().debug("Offline Account Exists Already. ID: " + identifier);
143
144      return new AccountAPIResponse(accounts.get(pair.get().getIdentifier().toString()), AccountResponse.ALREADY_EXISTS);
145    }
146
147    Account account;
148
149    if(!nonPlayer && UUIDProvider.validate(name)) {
150      try {
151
152        if(identifier == null) {
153          //Throw NPE if identifier is null to push down to our catch block.
154          PluginCore.log().debug("Tried to createAccount for player using null identifier. Name: " + name);
155          throw new NullPointerException("Tried to createAccount for player using null identifier.");
156        }
157
158        final UUID id = UUID.fromString(identifier);
159        account = new PlayerAccount(id, name);
160
161        uuidProvider.store(new UUIDPair(id, name));
162      } catch(final Exception ignore) {
163
164        //Our identifier is an invalid UUID, let's search for it.
165        final Optional<UUID> id = PluginCore.server().fromName(name);
166
167        if(id.isPresent()) {
168          account = new PlayerAccount(id.get(), name);
169
170          uuidProvider.store(new UUIDPair(id.get(), name));
171        } else {
172
173          return new AccountAPIResponse(null, AccountResponse.CREATION_FAILED);
174        }
175      }
176    } else if(!nonPlayer && name.startsWith(MainConfig.yaml().getString("Core.Server.Geyser", ".")) || !nonPlayer && PluginCore.server().online(name)) {
177
178      //This is most definitely a geyser player, they're online but not of valid names
179      try {
180
181        if(identifier == null) {
182          //Throw NPE if identifier is null to push down to our catch block.
183          PluginCore.log().debug("Tried to createAccount for player using null identifier. Name: " + name);
184          throw new NullPointerException("Tried to createAccount for player using null identifier.");
185        }
186
187        final UUID id = UUID.fromString(identifier);
188        account = new GeyserAccount(id, name);
189
190        uuidProvider.store(new UUIDPair(id, name));
191      } catch(final Exception ignore) {
192        return new AccountAPIResponse(null, AccountResponse.CREATION_FAILED);
193      }
194    } else {
195      final Optional<SharedAccount> nonPlayerAccount = createNonPlayerAccount(identifier, name);
196
197      if(nonPlayerAccount.isEmpty()) {
198        return new AccountAPIResponse(null, AccountResponse.CREATION_FAILED);
199      }
200      account = nonPlayerAccount.get();
201    }
202
203    final AccountCreateCallback callback = new AccountCreateCallback(account);
204    if(PluginCore.callbacks().call(callback)) {
205      return new AccountAPIResponse(account, AccountResponse.CREATION_FAILED_PLUGIN);
206    }
207
208    accounts.put(account.getIdentifier().toString(), account);
209
210    TNECore.instance().storage().store(account, account.getIdentifier().toString());
211
212    try {
213      uuidProvider.store(new UUIDPair(account.getIdentifier(), account.getName()));
214    } catch(final Exception ignore) {
215      //identifier isn't an uuid, so it'll be a string, most likely a non-player.
216    }
217    return new AccountAPIResponse(account, AccountResponse.CREATED);
218  }
219
220  /**
221   * Used to create a Non-Player account based on the name. This method will search the
222   * {@link #types} map for a suitable alternative.
223   *
224   * @param name The name to use for the creation.
225   *
226   * @return An Optional containing the new account class if it was able to be created, otherwise an
227   * empty Optional.
228   */
229  public Optional<SharedAccount> createNonPlayerAccount(final String identifier, final String name) {
230
231    UUID uuid = UUID.randomUUID();
232
233    try {
234      uuid = UUID.fromString(identifier);
235    } catch(final Exception ignore) {
236      //stay with the random UUID if the identifier passed isn't a UUID.
237    }
238
239    for(final Map.Entry<Class<? extends SharedAccount>, Function<String, Boolean>> entry : types.entrySet()) {
240
241      if(entry.getValue().apply(name)) {
242        try {
243          return Optional.of(entry.getKey().getDeclaredConstructor(UUID.class, String.class)
244                                     .newInstance(uuid, name));
245        } catch(final Exception e) {
246          PluginCore.log().error("An error occured while trying to create a new NonPlayer Account" +
247                                 "for : " + name, e, DebugLevel.STANDARD);
248        }
249      }
250    }
251
252    return Optional.empty();
253  }
254
255
256  /**
257   * Used to delete an {@link Account account} from an identifier.
258   *
259   * @param identifier The identifier to use for the search.
260   *
261   * @return The corresponding {@link EconomyResponse response}.
262   */
263  public EconomyResponse deleteAccount(@NotNull final UUID identifier) {
264
265    return deleteAccount(identifier.toString());
266  }
267
268  /**
269   * Used to delete an {@link Account account} from an identifier.
270   *
271   * @param identifier The identifier to use for the search.
272   *
273   * @return The corresponding {@link EconomyResponse response}.
274   */
275  public EconomyResponse deleteAccount(@NotNull final String identifier) {
276
277    if(!accounts.containsKey(identifier)) {
278      return AccountResponse.DOESNT_EXIST;
279    }
280
281    final AccountDeleteCallback callback = new AccountDeleteCallback(identifier);
282    PluginCore.callbacks().call(callback);
283
284    accounts.remove(identifier);
285    return AccountResponse.DELETED;
286  }
287
288  /**
289   * Used to find an {@link Account account} from a {@link UUID unique identifier}.
290   *
291   * @param id The id to use in the search.
292   *
293   * @return An optional containing the {@link Account account} if it exists, otherwise an empty
294   * optional.
295   */
296  public Optional<Account> findAccount(final UUID id) {
297
298    return Optional.ofNullable(accounts.get(id.toString()));
299  }
300
301  /**
302   * Used to find an {@link PlayerAccount account} from a {@link UUID unique identifier}.
303   *
304   * @param id The id to use in the search.
305   *
306   * @return An optional containing the {@link PlayerAccount account} if it exists, otherwise an
307   * empty optional.
308   */
309  public Optional<PlayerAccount> findPlayerAccount(final UUID id) {
310
311    final Account account = accounts.get(id.toString());
312
313    if((account instanceof PlayerAccount)) {
314      return Optional.of((PlayerAccount)account);
315    }
316    return Optional.empty();
317  }
318
319  /**
320   * Used to find an {@link Account account} from a string identifier, this could be a name or a
321   * different identifier.
322   *
323   * @param identifier The identifier to use in the search.
324   *
325   * @return An optional containing the {@link Account account} if it exists, otherwise an empty
326   * optional.
327   */
328  public Optional<Account> findAccount(final String identifier) {
329
330    //Check first to see if the identifier is in the accounts map.
331    //This would return non-player accounts.
332    final Account account = accounts.get(identifier);
333    if(account != null) {
334      return Optional.of(account);
335    }
336
337    final Optional<UUIDPair> id = uuidProvider.retrieve(identifier);
338
339    if(id.isPresent()) {
340      return findAccount(id.get().getIdentifier());
341    }
342    return Optional.empty();
343  }
344
345  public AccountStatus findStatus(final String identifier) {
346
347    if(statuses.containsKey(identifier)) {
348      return statuses.get(identifier);
349    }
350    return statuses.get("normal");
351  }
352
353  /**
354   * Adds a new {@link AccountStatus} status.
355   *
356   * @param status The account status to add
357   */
358  public void addAccountStatus(final AccountStatus status) {
359
360    statuses.put(status);
361  }
362
363  /**
364   * Adds a new {@link Account} type. These should extend the {@link SharedAccount}.
365   *
366   * @param type  The class for this type.
367   * @param check The function that should be used to check if a given String identifier, usually
368   *              name, is valid for this account type.
369   */
370  public void addAccountType(final Class<? extends NonPlayerAccount> type, final Function<String, Boolean> check) {
371
372    types.put(type, check);
373  }
374
375  /**
376   * Adds our default built-in account types.
377   */
378  public void addDefaultTypes() {
379
380    PluginCore.callbacks().call(new AccountTypesCallback());
381
382    for(final Class<? extends SharedAccount> account : types.keySet()) {
383      PluginCore.log().debug("Adding default account types: " + account.getClass().getSimpleName());
384    }
385
386    addAccountType(NonPlayerAccount.class, (value)->true);
387  }
388
389  public void addSwap(final String swapType, final UUID account, final UUID swapAccount) {
390
391    accountSwaps.put(swapType + ":" + account.toString(), swapAccount);
392  }
393
394  public void removeSwap(final String swapType, final UUID account) {
395
396    accountSwaps.remove(swapType + ":" + account.toString());
397  }
398
399  public UUID swap(final String swapType, final UUID account) {
400
401    return accountSwaps.getOrDefault(swapType + ":" + account.toString(), account);
402  }
403
404  public boolean excluded(final String name) {
405
406    for(final Pattern pattern : regexExclusions) {
407      if(pattern.matcher(name).matches()) return true;
408    }
409
410    for(final String str : exclusions) {
411      if(name.contains(str)) return true;
412    }
413    return false;
414  }
415
416  /**
417   * Adds our default built-in account types.
418   */
419  public void addDefaultStatuses() {
420
421    addAccountStatus(new AccountLockedStatus());
422    addAccountStatus(new AccountNormalStatus());
423    addAccountStatus(new AccountRestrictedStatus());
424  }
425
426  public EnhancedHashMap<String, AccountStatus> getStatuses() {
427
428    return statuses;
429  }
430
431  public EnhancedHashMap<String, Account> getAccounts() {
432
433    return accounts;
434  }
435
436  public UUIDProvider uuidProvider() {
437
438    return uuidProvider;
439  }
440
441  public List<UUID> getLoading() {
442
443    return loading;
444  }
445
446  public List<UUID> getImporting() {
447
448    return importing;
449  }
450
451  public List<Pattern> regexExclusions() {
452
453    return regexExclusions;
454  }
455
456  public List<String> exclusions() {
457
458    return exclusions;
459  }
460}
